name: Angela
greetingText: Just wanted to let you know that your name is really cool!
wishText:
It's amazing how a small realization can lead to big changes in one's life.
May that always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what we were going to do.

outroText: Okay, now come back and tell us if you liked it.
